ARABIC: وَقَالَتْ لِأُخْتِهِۦ قُصِّيهِ فَبَصُرَتْ بِهِۦ عَن جُنُبٍ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: She said to his sister, 'Go after him.' And she kept an eye on him from afar and they were not aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: She told his sister: "Follow him." So she kept an eye on him from a distance, unbeknown to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: She told the sister of Moses: "Follow him." So she kept watch over him unperceived (by the enemies).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: She told Moses' sister to follow her brother. His sister watched him from one side and the people of the Pharaoh did not notice her presence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And she said to his sister, “Go after him” – she therefore observed him from far, and they were not aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And she said to his sister: "Follow him." So she watched him from a far place (secretly), while they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And she said to his sister: Follow him up. So she watched him from a distance while they did not perceive,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and she said to his sister, 'Follow him,' and she perceived him from afar, even while they were not aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And she said unto his sister: Trace him. So she observed him from afar, and they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: She said to Moses' sister, "Go, and follow him." So she watched him from a distance, like a stranger, without anyone noticing her.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And she said unto his sister: follow him. So she watched him from afar; and they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: She said to his sister, ‘Follow him.’ So she watched him from a distance, while they were not aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And she said to the sister of (Moses), "Follow him" so she (the sister) watched him in the character of a stranger. And they knew not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And she said to his [Musa's (Moses)] sister: "Follow him." So she (his sister) watched him from a far place secretly, while they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: She said to his sister: 'Follow him' And she watched him from a distance, but they were unaware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: She said to his sister, “Trail him.” So she watched him from afar, and they were unaware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And she said to his sister, "Follow him"; so she watched him from a distance while they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:11] And she said to his sister, Mary, ‘Follow him’, in other words, follow where he goes in order to find out his news. So she watched him from afar, from a distance, secretly, while they were not aware, that she was his sister, or that she was [even] watching him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And she) the mother of Moses (said unto his sister) the sister of Moses whose name was Mary: (Trace him. So she observed him) the child (from afar, and they perceived not) that she is the sister of Moses.
